desc: It can be a concierge, camera, flashlight, game console, magazine, photo editor, panorama maker, note taker, travel planner, radio, bookstore, night-sky guide, GPS, music player, music maker, and plenty moreâ€¦if only you could figure out which of the 250,000 (and counting) apps to put on your iPhone or iPad or iPod touch.
